about_the_game:
Lullaby of Lost Soul - is an anime-horror game developed using Unreal Engine 5. The game offers an immersive survival horror adventure where players must uncover the dark secrets of an abandoned Academy. Combining elements of Japanese animation with cutting-edge graphics, it creates a unique atmosphere of fear and mystery. Explore the eerie halls of the Academy, where mysterious shadows and paranormal occurrences make every corner more thrilling and terrifying to investigate.

As night falls, the Academy is shrouded in darkness and silence. All students and faculty have long left the premises, but locked doors and the relentless passage of time remain. It is in this moment that the dangerous journey begins, venturing through empty corridors and dark classrooms where something mysterious lurks.

Players must explore the Academy, solve intricate puzzles, interact with various objects, uncover hidden clues, and decipher ancient riddles to unravel the mystery of the ghost that appears in the most unexpected places. However, caution is necessary, as the corridors of the Academy hold not only the spirit but also countless enigmas tied to its history.

  • The protagonist is one of the students, endowed with unique abilities that can help uncover the true cause of the mysterious ghost girl's death. Yet her spirit is unwilling to let go of anyone daring to delve into her story. Under the cover of night, encounters with her grow increasingly perilous, and players must learn to avoid traps and manipulate their surroundings to avoid becoming her next victim.

  • The key to solving the mystery lies in the Academy's past, in ancient legends and mystical events that led to the girl’s tragic demise. The reason for her restless spirit is hidden in these events, and the threat to future generations of students grows more evident. Once the true cause of her death is revealed, a way to stop the danger and break the curse will emerge.

Game Features:

  • Interactive puzzles requiring keen observation and logical thinking.

  • An atmospheric experience in the dark and ominous locations of the Academy.

  • Paranormal phenomena and mystical enigmas awaiting resolution, with the ghostly girl attempting to thwart the investigation.

  • Uncovering the Academy’s history and pacifying the spirit to lift the curse.

content_descriptors.notes: The game will feature implicit marigolds, short skirts, and female forms.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 8/10/11 (64-Bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-8100
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060 / AMD R9 270X
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: SSD disk is recommended
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 8/10/11 (64-Bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 10400
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2060
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: SSD disk is recommended

short_description: Lullaby of Lost Soul is an atmospheric horror game with anime-style graphics, built on Unreal Engine 5. Explore the eerie Academy, uncover its secrets, and face the ghost of a deceased girl. Solve puzzles, evade traps, and unravel the mystical story to break an ancient curse.
